meanings.definition: The process by which cells become specialized in structure and function during development.
meanings.sent1: During cytodifferentiation, cells change to have specific jobs in the body.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study cytodifferentiation to understand how cells develop different functions.
meanings.sent3: The party of cells celebrated their cytodifferentiation by each wearing a unique hat.
meanings.sent4: In the orchestra of the body, cytodifferentiation is like each instrument playing its own melody.
meanings.sent5: Cytodifferentiation is like a team of workers each having their own role to build a complex structure.

meanings.definition: The differentiation of cells into specific types within an organism.
meanings.sent1: The cytodifferentiation of cells in the body helps maintain balance and order.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study cytodifferentiation to understand how cells specialize in different functions.
meanings.sent3: The cytodifferentiation of cells in the garden made each flower bloom in a different color.
meanings.sent4: In the puzzle of life, cytodifferentiation is like each piece fitting perfectly into its place.
meanings.sent5: Cytodifferentiation is like a group of students choosing different subjects to excel in.
